law.catch_line: The purposes of the Program are to provide facilities or programs that offer and provide:...
law.text:
The purposes of the Program are to provide facilities or programs that offer and provide:
crisis and transition shelter, proper nutrition, and adequate services to homeless individuals and families, which may include linkage to multiple service components, centralized decision making regarding placement, case management, transportation, and follow-up services; and
services to prevent individuals and families in a housing crisis from becoming homeless.
